message.desc: This action will redirect you to web browser to download the backup of the system, please keep it by your own.

restorebackup.title: System Recover
restorebackup.desc:
This action will restore the system from your upload, all data and configurations will be lost. Please backup your system first.

Recommend to recover all locations to synchronize the device status with the database.

message.readytorestore: Are you sure to restore from System Backup
message.readytorestorefromupload: Are you sure to restore from your upload file
